pr_title: Support non-hive types in hive views

timeline.bodyText: we should add a comment explaining why we have the dummy instead of proper column metadata. In my opinion, the message should be very clear - Using dummy since column "abc" has an unsupported Hive type "xyz" to avoid getting questions around why is my column metadata missing.
timeline.author: mayankgarg1990

timeline.message:
Suport non-hive types for Hive views

When a non-hive type is used for any column in a hive view, include only
a single dummy column in the metastore.
